## Global Map

```{r}
# Create data
data=as.data.frame(rbind(
  'Okavango Delta, Botswana'=c(22.5601, -19.0901),
	'Yakutia, Russia'=c(120.3300, 63.4300),
	'USA-Mexico Grasslands'=c(-110.5901, 31.3400),
	'Acre Rainforest, Brasil'=c(-71.9610, -9.1901)
	))
colnames(data)=c("long","lat")

# https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/maps/maps.pdf 
# make the map
map('world',col="#f2f2f2", fill=TRUE, bg="white", lwd=0.15,mar=rep(0,4),border=0, ylim=c(-70,80), resolution=0 )
map.scale(relwidth = 0.15, metric = TRUE, ratio = FALSE)
points(x=data$long, y=data$lat, col="black", cex=2, pch=20)
text(rownames(data), x=data$long, y=data$lat,  col="black", cex=1, pos=4)

```
Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
